name: android-manifest-version
description: Bump the version of your android manifest file at build time.
author: James Montemagno

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: Android Manifest File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full path to android manifest file.

inputs.name: versionCodeOption
inputs.label: Version Code Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the type of version code format that you would like to use. Selecting timestamp ignores the version code.

inputs.name: versionCode
inputs.label: Version Code (must be integer)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number to set the version code to, must be an integer  (see Android documentation).

inputs.name: versionCodeOffset
inputs.label: Version Code Offset
inputs.helpMarkDown: A number to offset the version code below by, must be an integer.

inputs.name: versionName
inputs.label: Version Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version number shown to users (leave blank to use existing versionName in AndroidManifest.xml).

inputs.name: printFile
inputs.label: Print File
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you would like to print the file contents before and after changing variables.
